00047 struct
00048 {
00049       PARSE_STAGE curElement;
00050 
00051       INT8        szCharData[MAX_CHAR_DATA_LENGTH+1];
00052 
00053       UINT16                  curIncompatibleAttachment[2];
00054       UINT32                  maxArraySize;
00055       UINT32                  curIndex;   
00056       UINT32                  currentDepth;
00057       UINT32                  maxReadDepth;
00058 }
00059 typedef incompatibleattachmentParseData;
00060 
00061 static void XMLCALL 
00062 incompatibleattachmentStartElementHandle(void *userData, const char *name, const char **atts)
00063 {
00064       incompatibleattachmentParseData * pData = (incompatibleattachmentParseData *)userData;
00065 
00066       if(pData->currentDepth <= pData->maxReadDepth) //are we reading this element?
00067       {
00068             if(strcmp(name, "INCOMPATIBLEATTACHMENTLIST") == 0 && pData->curElement == ELEMENT_NONE)
00069             {
00070                   pData->curElement = ELEMENT_LIST;
00071 
00072                   pData->maxReadDepth++; //we are not skipping this element
00073             }
00074             else if(strcmp(name, "INCOMPATIBLEATTACHMENT") == 0 && pData->curElement == ELEMENT_LIST)
00075             {
00076                   pData->curElement = ELEMENT;
00077 
00078                   //DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3,"IncompatibleAttachmentStartElementHandle: setting memory for curIncompatibleAttachment");
00079 
00080                   memset(&pData->curIncompatibleAttachment,0,sizeof(UINT16[2]));
00081 
00082                   pData->maxReadDepth++; //we are not skipping this element
00083                   pData->curIndex++;
00084             }
00085             else if(pData->curElement == ELEMENT &&
00086                         (strcmp(name, "incompatibleattachmentIndex") == 0 ||
00087                         strcmp(name, "itemIndex") == 0 ))
00088             {
00089                   pData->curElement = ELEMENT_PROPERTY;
00090 
00091                   pData->maxReadDepth++; //we are not skipping this element
00092             }
00093 
00094             pData->szCharData[0] = '\0';
00095       }
00096 
00097       pData->currentDepth++;
00098 
00099 }
00100 
00101 static void XMLCALL
00102 incompatibleattachmentCharacterDataHandle(void *userData, const char *str, int len)
00103 {
00104       incompatibleattachmentParseData * pData = (incompatibleattachmentParseData *)userData;
00105 
00106       if( (pData->currentDepth <= pData->maxReadDepth) && 
00107             (strlen(pData->szCharData) < MAX_CHAR_DATA_LENGTH)
00108         ){
00109             strncat(pData->szCharData,str,__min((unsigned int)len,MAX_CHAR_DATA_LENGTH-strlen(pData->szCharData)));
00110       }
00111 }
00112 
00113 
00114 static void XMLCALL
00115 incompatibleattachmentEndElementHandle(void *userData, const char *name)
00116 {
00117       incompatibleattachmentParseData * pData = (incompatibleattachmentParseData *)userData;
00118 
00119       if(pData->currentDepth <= pData->maxReadDepth) //we're at the end of an element that we've been reading
00120       {
00121             if(strcmp(name, "INCOMPATIBLEATTACHMENTLIST") == 0)
00122             {
00123                   pData->curElement = ELEMENT_NONE;
00124             }
00125             else if(strcmp(name, "INCOMPATIBLEATTACHMENT") == 0)
00126             {
00127                   pData->curElement = ELEMENT_LIST;
00128 
00129                   if(pData->curIndex < pData->maxArraySize)
00130                   {
00131                         //DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3,"IncompatibleAttachmentStartElementHandle: writing incompatibleattachment to array");
00132                         IncompatibleAttachments[pData->curIndex][0] = pData->curIncompatibleAttachment[0]; //write the incompatibleattachment into the table
00133                         IncompatibleAttachments[pData->curIndex][1] = pData->curIncompatibleAttachment[1];
00134                   }
00135             }
00136             else if(strcmp(name, "incompatibleattachmentIndex") == 0)
00137             {
00138                   pData->curElement = ELEMENT;
00139                   pData->curIncompatibleAttachment[1] = (UINT16) atol(pData->szCharData);
00140             }
00141             else if(strcmp(name, "itemIndex") == 0)
00142             {
00143                   pData->curElement = ELEMENT;
00144                   pData->curIncompatibleAttachment[0] = (UINT16) atol(pData->szCharData);
00145             }
00146 
00147             pData->maxReadDepth--;
00148       }
00149 
00150       pData->currentDepth--;
00151 }

00156 BOOLEAN ReadInIncompatibleAttachmentStats(STR fileName)
00157 {
00158       HWFILE            hFile;
00159       UINT32            uiBytesRead;
00160       UINT32            uiFSize;
00161       CHAR8 *           lpcBuffer;
00162       XML_Parser  parser = XML_ParserCreate(NULL);
00163       
00164       incompatibleattachmentParseData pData;
00165 
00166       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, "Loading IncompatibleAttachments.xml" );
00167 
00168       // Open incompatibleattachments file
00169       hFile = FileOpen( fileName, FILE_ACCESS_READ, FALSE );
00170       if ( !hFile )
00171             return( FALSE );
00172       
00173       uiFSize = FileGetSize(hFile);
00174       lpcBuffer = (CHAR8 *) MemAlloc(uiFSize+1);
00175 
00176       //Read in block
00177       if ( !FileRead( hFile, lpcBuffer, uiFSize, &uiBytesRead ) )
00178       {
00179             MemFree(lpcBuffer);
00180             return( FALSE );
00181       }
00182 
00183       lpcBuffer[uiFSize] = 0; //add a null terminator
00184 
00185       FileClose( hFile );
00186 
00187       
00188       XML_SetElementHandler(parser, incompatibleattachmentStartElementHandle, incompatibleattachmentEndElementHandle);
00189       XML_SetCharacterDataHandler(parser, incompatibleattachmentCharacterDataHandle);
00190 
00191       
00192       memset(&pData,0,sizeof(pData));
00193       pData.maxArraySize = MAXATTACHMENTS; 
00194       pData.curIndex = -1;
00195       
00196       XML_SetUserData(parser, &pData);
00197 
00198 
00199     if(!XML_Parse(parser, lpcBuffer, uiFSize, TRUE))
00200       {
00201             CHAR8 errorBuf[511];
00202 
00203             sprintf(errorBuf, "XML Parser Error in IncompatibleAttachments.xml: %s at line %d", XML_ErrorString(XML_GetErrorCode(parser)), XML_GetCurrentLineNumber(parser));
00204             LiveMessage(errorBuf);
00205 
00206             MemFree(lpcBuffer);
00207             return FALSE;
00208       }
00209 
00210       MemFree(lpcBuffer);
00211 
00212 
00213       XML_ParserFree(parser);
00214 
00215       return( TRUE );
00216 }
00217 BOOLEAN WriteIncompatibleAttachmentStats()
00218 {
00219       HWFILE            hFile;
00220 
00221       //Debug code; make sure that what we got from the file is the same as what's there
00222       // Open a new file
00223       hFile = FileOpen( "TABLEDATA\\IncompatibleAttachments out.xml", FILE_ACCESS_WRITE | FILE_CREATE_ALWAYS, FALSE );
00224       if ( !hFile )
00225             return( FALSE );
00226       
00227       {
00228             UINT32 cnt;
00229 
00230             FilePrintf(hFile,"<INCOMPATIBLEATTACHMENTLIST>\r\n");
00231             for(cnt = 0;cnt < MAXATTACHMENTS;cnt++)
00232             {
00233                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t<INCOMPATIBLEATTACHMENT>\r\n");
00234 
00235                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<itemIndex>%d</itemIndex>\r\n",                                     IncompatibleAttachments[cnt][0]);
00236                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<incompatibleattachmentIndex>%d</incompatibleattachmentIndex>\r\n",                               IncompatibleAttachments[cnt][1]);
00237 
00238                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t</INCOMPATIBLEATTACHMENT>\r\n");
00239             }
00240             FilePrintf(hFile,"</INCOMPATIBLEATTACHMENTLIST>\r\n");
00241       }
00242       FileClose( hFile );
00243 
00244       return( TRUE );
00245 }
